cpg.mvc.crossword.model

Class Word

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpg.mvc.crossword.model.Word

  • public class Word
extends java.lang.Object
    Model Class for a word in the crossword puzzle. It is a WordList entry and consists of a keyword, that is the word to be guessed in the crossword puzzle and a list of clues, that are hints for a specific keyword. It also gives information about whether a keyword is checked, e.g. selected in a CheckBox.

    An entry in the clueList is a Pair that consists of a StringProperty and a BooleanProperty, that represent the clue and the checked status of a clue.
    See Also:
    WordList
